NK040(thi)027:2: rus pa'i rgyan cha khra la la //
NK040(thi)027:3: dar gyi cod pan pu ru ru //
NK040(thi)027:4: d+aa ru cang til khra la la //
NK040(thi)027:5: sil snyan mang po si li li //
NK040(thi)027:6: mi rkang gling bu kyu ru ru //
NK040(thi)027:7: gar dang rol mo shigs se shig /
NK040(thi)027:8: nyams myong mgur ma 'u ru ru //
NK040(thi)027:9: byin rlabs na bun thibs se thib //
NK040(thi)027:10: gdam ngag sbrang char si li li //
NK040(thi)027:11: 'gro don phyogs med ya la la //
NK040(thi)027:12: ma 'khor dang bcas pa khyed rnams kyis //
NK040(thi)027:13: bdag dang mkha' mnyam sems can la //
